main event: A UFO was observed on July 22, 1961, via ground-radar, with a single target identified by USAF and FAA near Dayton, Ohio.
interesting points: The radar observed the object for 1-2 minutes before losing contact,The target reappeared at Fairborn, Ohio,Ground-radar and air-intercept radar contact was lost due to ground clutter,Further investigation was recommended despite the radar target showing positive motion,The sighting involved only one object and no visual confirmation could be achieved.
